snippet: Months after meeting with an opposition leader and being told to leave the country, Tom Malinowski, the assistant secretary of state for human rights, will visit with another member of the State Department.
abstract: Tom Malinowski, State Department's assistant secretary for human rights, will return to Bahrain almost five months after he was expelled for meeting with opposition leader.
lead_paragraph: Months after meeting with an opposition leader and being told to leave the country, Tom Malinowski, the assistant secretary of state for human rights, will visit with another member of the State Department.

headline.main: Expelled U.S. Official to Return to Bahrain
headline.print_headline: Expelled U.S. Official to Return to Bahrain

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
